did.unittitle: Human Kinetics and Leisure Studies Department records

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: George Washington University. Dept. of Kinetics and Human Leisure Studies

did.abstract: This collection contains annual reports, brochures, questionnaires, applications, news releases, studies programs, teaching loads, and flyers. This material is dated from 1930-2003.

prefercite.head: Preferred citation
prefercite.p: Human Kinetics and Leisure Studies Department records, Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Some material may be copyrighted or restricted. It is the patron's obligation to determine and satisfy copyright or other case restrictions when publishing or otherwise distributing materials found in the collections.

bioghist.head: Historical or Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The Human Kinetics and Leisure Studies Department began as a part of the School of Education and Human Development. Until 1994, the Human Kinetics and Leisure Studies Department existed as one of three departments: Education, Human Kinetics and Leisure Studies, and Special Education. The undergraduate degree programs in the Department of Human Kinetics and Leisure Studies were designed for students interested in such fields as athletic coaching and team management, dance, exercise and physical recreation specialists, paramedical field of stress testing, teaching physical education in elementary and secondary schools, tourism and travel, and therapeutic recreation. The department ceased to exist by that name in 1995, and now the same type of degrees may be obtained in the discipline of Exercise Science in the School of Public Health and Health Services. The School of Education and Human Development is now the Graduate School of Education and Human Development.

scopecontent.head: Collection Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains annual reports, brochures, questionnaires, applications, news releases, studies programs, teaching loads, and flyers. This material is dated from 1930-2003.

The materials concern the Department of Human Kinetics and Leisure Studies's (HKLS) programs, courses, co-ed recreation, exhibits, dance degree programs, therapeutic recreation technician certificate program, the Institute of Certified Travel Agents, graduate teaching assistants, travel and tourism programs, therapeutic recreation, the International Institute of Tourism Studies, committees, symposiums, seminars, and events. The annual reports are from the Department of Physical Education for Women and Athletes.

arrangement.head: Collection Organization
arrangement.p: Organized in three series: Department files, Annual reports, and Teaching loads.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

did.unittitle: Department files

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series contains flyers, programs, brochures, questionnaires, applications, studies, and news releases. They range in date from 1975 to 2003. The materials concern the Department of Human Kinetics and Leisure Studies's (HKLS) programs, courses, co-ed recreation, exhibits, dance degree programs, therapeutic recreation technician certificate program, the Institute of Certified Travel Agents, graduate teaching assistants, travel and tourism programs, therapeutic recreation, the International Institute of Tourism Studies, committees, symposiums, seminars, and events.

scopecontent.p: This series contains annual reports for athletics and physical education for women. This material is dated from 1930-68.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series contains teaching loads and course descriptions from the departments of Physical Education for Women and Men. Materials range in date from 1960-70.

did.unittitle: Teaching load: Summary and Course Offerings

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Teaching loads from the Physical Education department, 1960-65. Information includes courses that were taught, names of professors, and correspondence.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains reports relating to tourism research dating from 1984-1998.
